short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transforms your new tab into a mysterious and captivating Halloween scene.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The background features glowing jack-o'-lanterns lighting up a dim pathway that leads to an ancient, eerie gate. Red autumn leaves fill the darkened sky, with a full moon shining above, casting a haunting glow. The silhouette of a lone figure stands at the entrance, adding an air of mystery and adventure. Perfect for fans of Halloween and dark fantasy themes, this extension brings a magical yet spooky atmosphere to your browsing experience.
